required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic Study to Compare Two Formulations of Paracetamol
clinical_study.official_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study to Evaluate the Rate and Extent of Absorption of Paracetamol From Two Formulations in an Indian Population.

brief_summary.textblock: A pharmacokinetic study in healthy volunteers comparing two formulations of paracetamol fast release in fasted state.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at 15 minutes pre-dose, then at 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 60, 75, 90 minutes post dose and then at 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 hrs post dose.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero and extrapolated to infinite time.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at 15 minutes pre-dose, then at 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 60, 75, 90 minutes post dose and then at 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 hrs post dose.
Blood samples drawn at 15 minutes pre-dose, then at 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 60, 75, 90 minutes post dose and then at 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 hrs post dose.
primary_outcome.description: Area under the plasma concentration time curve from zero and extrapolated to the time of last quantifiable sample.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples drawn at 15 minutes pre-dose, then at 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 35, 40, 45, 50, 60, 75, 90 minutes post dose and then at 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 hrs post dose.
secondary_outcome.description: Time taken to reach maximum plasma concentration of paracetamol.

arm_group.description: Experimental paracetamol tablet (500 milligrams [mg]) administered with 240 milliliters (mL) of water.
Standard paracetamol tablet (500 mg) administered with 240 mL of water.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy male volunteers aged 18-55yrs willing to give written informed consent for the study
- BMI must be within the range 18.5 - 24.9 kg/m^2
- Participant with a minimum weight of 50 kg
Exclusion Criteria:
- Participant with current or recurrent disease that could affect the action, absorption or disposition of the study medication or clinical or laboratory assessments (e.g. hepatic disorders, renal insufficiency, congestive heart failure)
- Participant with known or suspected intolerance or hypersensitivity to the study materials
- Participant who are vegetarian
- Participant smoking more than five cigarettes a day
